comment.author: Eric
comment.text: I thought he keeps saying the Mexican illegals were stealing our jobs? Now it's our people are moving to Mexico?

replies.author: Kelly
replies.text: It is confusing to you isn't it. Figure it out.

replies.author: Eric
replies.text: My point is he says the illegals coming to America steal our jobs. If the Mexican economy is doing so well then why would illegals even need to come over to our country to get jobs. More people are leaving this country than coming in because the Mexican economy is thriving, therefore if they are leaving any way then why build a wall?

replies.author: Eric
replies.text: Deporting immigrants and building a wall would destroy our economy because over half of our farming industry would be down employees
